name: mariadb_ready_to_go
postCreateCommand: sudo apt update && sudo apt install mariadb-server python3 python3-pip -y && sudo service mariadb start && pip install python-dotenv mysql-connector-python pandas flask flask-cors && sudo mariadb -e "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS $DB_NAME; CREATE USER IF NOT EXISTS '$DB_USER'@'%' IDENTIFIED BY '$DB_PASSWORD'; GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON $DB_NAME.* TO '$DB_USER'@'%'; FLUSH PRIVILEGES;" && sudo npm install -g @angular/cli && cd WorkHub && npm install && cd ..
